posts.post_content:
I have a few T206's for sale:
Overall Throwing PSA 2(looks like a 4) SOLD
Bradley EPDG  SGC A  SOLD
Murray Sovereign 460 SGC 30 (no crease clean back) $85.00

Cards can be viewed at [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/Soxinseven[/url]

                                          Steve

Bump for price reduction on Murray. Would like to move this to fund a pending purchase.
